q: spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night.`` It was a huge lift off of me,'' Allen Iverson said. Bob Marley knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. Bob Marley wanted to get the monkey off my back. Bob Marley 'm just excited that Bob Marley got my first win and Bob Marley can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . 11:43 UK time, Friday, 21 January 2011 Here's Stephanie Flanders with details of tonight's programme: What did you know, and when did you know it? It's the question that has dogged Andy Coulson - and his boss- since the former News of the World Editor became David Cameron 's director of communications in 2007. Explaining his resignation today, he said``

that he's done for me, for the government and for the country,'' David Cameron said. Opposition leader Ed Miliband said his Labour Party had been proved right to question Andy Coulson 's position. Labour has been saying for some months that there are real questions about Andy Coulson 's ability to do his job given the cloud of allegations hanging over him, Ed Miliband said. The government is pushing through harsh spending cuts to tackle a record budget deficit.
